title: Disputing other parts of the claim
captionHeading: Respond to a property possession claim
content:
You should view the claim (opens in new tab) to see if there's any other parts of the claim that are incorrect or you disagree with.

This includes:

  • {{claimantName}}'s grounds for possession (their reasons for making the claim)
  • any documents they've uploaded to support their claim
  • any other information they've given as part of their claim

disputeDetails.label: Explain which parts of the claim you do not agree with
